{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04383v1", "title": "Self-affine sponges with random contractions", "summary": "We compute the almost sure Hausdorff dimension of random self-affine sponges
in $\mathbb{R}^d$ without imposing any separation conditions. In this context,
randomness arises from the matrices in the defining semigroup, which are random
yet the corresponding affine maps share a fixed point.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS,math.PR", "published": "2025-05-07T13:04:37Z"}
